title: HUGE Lag Spikes In Canada
body:
There's a lot of users who are experiencing huge lag spikes in Canada and it has already been posted several times but, Riot seriously needs to address this problem because there hasn't been a solution for quite a while. I am confident that it isn't solely an ISP's problem but, mainly Riot's servers based on different feedback. 

Here's 2 threads discussing the same issue:
___http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/TIAjA1NZ-absolutely-insane-lag
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hXEA84rO-every-game-constant-disconnect___

replies.body:
These lag spikes seem to be coming from an issue with Rogers ISP. They are aware that they have been experiencing some issues with their service, and you can keep updated on their progress on their [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RogersHelps/status/839999412164157441).

Thanks for being patient with them!
I understand but, the issue is not just with Rogers ISP, other players are getting lag from other ISP's like Bell and Comwave.

If you don't think your lag spikes are coming from your ISP, let's see if we can narrow down your issue on our end! Let's go through our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first to be sure that everything is in order there.

Feel free to hit me back up!
